content.raw: gazebo logging only captures model and link states which are pose and velocity data. It does not log msgs that gazebo/drcsim publish or subscribe to. For post contest investigation, you can playback the state.log to watch out for strange movements of models in gzclient, and dig into velocity data if needed. For me I think it's ok if this helps to reduce errors on the portal end.
